lines.text: Don't hit me in the mouth again, you'll break my dental plate.

[Upon seeing the two girls skinny dipping in a pond]
Okay, crawl out!
Oh, that'd be neglect of duty.
Well, at least turn around. You're not much of a gentleman!
Huh! I never was! Now get out!

[One of the workers has dumped an empty cotton bag on her head]
Hey, why don't you warn a guy! With two heads you'd still be a moron!
she dies in a strange place without friends or anybody, and nobody even knows her name.
The Law? Mother, I don't care about the Law. And I don't think you will either, not after I tell you a few of the things that are going on out at Mr. Tropp's private little kingdom.
You know what I found out about that food? Tropp's feeding canned dog food and he calls it "beef stew"!
Oh, no, no! Russ wouldn't do a thing like that!
What do you mean he wouldn't do it? He's doing it! Mother, I saw the empty cans.
